item.title: The U.S. Conference Of Catholic Bishops Needs To Stop Apologizing For Islam
item.description: Islam’s inherent disdain for non-Muslims must not intrude on the pieties of interfaith harmony, according to the USCCB.

item.title: The Feds Are Rescuing Trafficked Children From L.A. While Useless Democrats Grumble
item.description: Elected officials in L.A. and California relentlessly assault reality, while the people they demean and demonize spend their days running down people ...

item.title: Democrats Choose Supporting LGBT Activists Over Stopping Child Rape
item.description: We have yet to find a point at which the left will actually stop its slide down the slippery slope of gay rights.

item.title: ‘Conservative’ Pollster Shills For Health Insurance Companies With Sloppy Pro-Obamacare Talking Points
item.description: The arguments for extending the enhanced Obamacare subsidies are not just biased but contradictory, almost to the point of incoherence.

item.title: Why Male Teachers Left Elementary Schools And Won’t Go Back
item.description: Men were driven out by the increasing feminization of schools, producing a vicious cycle of female-dominated schools.
